languages.text: "В ваших словах много желтого, что мягко окутывает Вольного Торговца. Но за ними... я вижу болотную грязь. Вы пытаетесь оградить Лорд-капитана от неприглядной правды, но слуги обязаны разделять с господами любую истину".

"Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."
languages.original_text: "В ваших словах много желтого, что мягко окутывает Вольного Торговца. Но за ними... я вижу болотную грязь. Вы пытаетесь оградить Лорд-капитана от неприглядной правды, но слуги обязаны разделять с господами любую истину".

traits.locale_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

"Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

"Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

"Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

languages.text: « La lâcheté de vos propos porte ombrage {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}... Je vois distinctement la fange qui se tapit derrière ! Vous cherchez à cacher {mf|au|à la} {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} une vérité malvenue, mais il est du devoir d'un serviteur de dire la vérité à son maître, quelle qu'elle soit. »
languages.original_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

traits.locale_text: « La lâcheté de vos propos porte ombrage {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}... Je vois distinctement la fange qui se tapit derrière ! Vous cherchez à cacher {mf|au|à la} {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} une vérité malvenue, mais il est du devoir d'un serviteur de dire la vérité à son maître, quelle qu'elle soit. »

languages.text: “你说出了黄绿色的言语，蒙蔽了行商浪人……但我却看到了粉饰之下的泥沼。你想保护领主舰长，所以不愿意说出不体面的真相，但仆人的义务就是把一切真相都告诉主人。”
languages.original_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

traits.locale_text: “你说出了黄绿色的言语，蒙蔽了行商浪人……但我却看到了粉饰之下的泥沼。你想保护领主舰长，所以不愿意说出不体面的真相，但仆人的义务就是把一切真相都告诉主人。”

languages.text: "Eure feigen Worte umhüllen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit Wolken ... doch ich sehe den Schmutz hinter der Fassade. Ihr versucht, den Lord Captain vor der hässlichen Wahrheit zu schützen, doch es ist die Pflicht eines Dieners, jede Wahrheit mit seinem Meister zu teilen."
languages.original_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

traits.locale_text: "Eure feigen Worte umhüllen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit Wolken ... doch ich sehe den Schmutz hinter der Fassade. Ihr versucht, den Lord Captain vor der hässlichen Wahrheit zu schützen, doch es ist die Pflicht eines Dieners, jede Wahrheit mit seinem Meister zu teilen."

languages.text: «Sus amarillas palabras confunden a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente... pero puedo ver el lodazal detrás del barniz. Está intentando proteger a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán de la verdad, pero es deber de una sirviente ser completamente sincera con su amo».
languages.original_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

traits.locale_text: «Sus amarillas palabras confunden a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente... pero puedo ver el lodazal detrás del barniz. Está intentando proteger a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán de la verdad, pero es deber de una sirviente ser completamente sincera con su amo».

languages.text: 「あなたの嫉妬に駆られた言葉は自由開拓者の思考を淀ませます…ですが、あたくしは薄壁の後ろから沼の泥を見ることができる。ロード・キャプテンを醜い真実から守ろうとしているようですが、どんな真実も主と分かち合うのが家臣の義務です」
languages.original_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの嫉妬に駆られた言葉は自由開拓者の思考を淀ませます…ですが、あたくしは薄壁の後ろから沼の泥を見ることができる。ロード・キャプテンを醜い真実から守ろうとしているようですが、どんな真実も主と分かち合うのが家臣の義務です」

languages.text: "Sarı sözcüklerinle Hür Tacir'in aklını bulandırabilirsin. Bense maskenin ardındaki pis gerçeği görebiliyorum. Lord Kaptan'ı nahoş gerçeklerden korumaya çalışıyorsun ancak bir hizmetkârın görevi, efendisiyle tüm gerçekleri paylaşmaktır."
languages.original_text: "Your yellow words becloud the Rogue Trader... yet I can see the swampy muck behind the veneer. You are trying to shield the Lord Captain from the unseemly truth, but it is a servant's duty to share every truth with their master."

traits.locale_text: "Sarı sözcüklerin Hür Tacir'in etrafını bulutlandırıyor ancak maskenin arkasındaki bataklık balçığını görebiliyorum. Lord Kaptan'ı nahoş gerçeklerden korumaya çalışıyorsun ancak bir hizmetkârın görevi efendisiyle tüm gerçekleri paylaşmaktır."
